description.value: The rogue gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.gTrGPxzN054GfpkM]{Improved Trip} as a bonus feat, even if she does not meet the prerequisites. At 6th level, she is treated as if she meets all the prerequisites of @Compendium[pf1.feats.lNyMFFQaOxxTOW7M]{Greater Trip} (although she must take the feat as normal to gain its benefits).
